review: I had been to hospital and it was for knee pain. ********* *** **** ** ******* I would like to recommend the doctor to other people. There was less waiting time in the hospital when we went.  It was for 15 minutes. Painkillers were recommended by the doctor. Exercise was suggested.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Narendra Dasaraju was very friendly and explained very clearly about the causes and treatment to be taken for the knee pain. *** ********* *** **** ******** *** the treatment [rescribed by him was simple and succesful. I recommend him for any orthopaedic ailment
